Mollwitz.name: The Battle of Mollwitz
Mollwitz.description: April 10, 1741. The War of the Austrian Succession

main.longDescription: Historical scenario. Hard for Austrians to win.

extraArt.longDescription: Extra artillery gives Austrians more opportunities to attack.

command.longDescription: Experimental version using command head quarters.

Hastenbeck.name: The Battle of Hastenbeck
Hastenbeck.description: July 26, 1757. French vs Anglo Allies. The Seven Years War

main.longDescription: Original version of game. French have 50-50 chance of deploying up and to the right, or fartherback.

Hastenbeck2.longDescription: Same game as original, but french are always deployed farther back

hastenbeckredux.longDescription: French deploy farther forward but, there are less of them.

Hohenfriedeberg.name: The Battle of Hohenfriedeberg
Hohenfriedeberg.description: June 4 1745. Prussian vs Austrian. The War of the Austrian Succession.

BigAustrian.description: Larger Austrian force for play balance

deployForward.description: Prussians deploy farther forward, Bigger Austrians too.
deployForward.longDescription: Prussians deploy farther forward. Larger Russian units for play balance. Game is one turn shorter

main.longDescription: A balanced game.

Malplaquet.name: The Battle of Malplaquet
Malplaquet.description: September 11, 1709. The War of the Spanish Succession

main.longDescription: Can be hard for British

Burkersdorf.description: July 21, 1762. Prussian vs Austrian. The Seven Years War.

options.name: Fog of war during Deployment. Enemy units remain hidden until movement phase..

main.longDescription: Historical Forces, favors Prussians.

requiredDeploy.longDescription: New Map, Prussians must deploy in a limited number of hexes.

Kolin1757.name: The Battle of Kolin 1757
Kolin1757.description: June 18, 1757. Prussian vs Austrian. The Seven Years War.

main.longDescription: favors Austrians

fredBringsMore.longDescription: Frederick the Great brings more troops to be even greater.

fredBringsABitMore.longDescription: Frederick the Great brings just a few more troops, justa  few.

Klissow1702.name: The Battle of Klissow 1702
Klissow1702.description: The Battle of Klissow took place on July 8 (Julian calendar) / July 9 (Swedish calendar) / July 19, 1702 (Gregorian calendar) near Kliszów, Poland-Lithuania, during the Great Northern War.

options.name: Swedish units have step reduction and can be reduced to half strength in an exchange.

main.longDescription: Historical Scenario. Hard for Sweden to win.

alternate.longDescription: Historical Scenario very hard for Swedish to win. Play Balance variation

main.longDescription: Historical balance. Tends to favor the Prussians.

bigRussian.longDescription: Larger Russian units for play balance.

deployForward.description: Prussians deploy farther forward, Bigger Russians too.
deployForward.longDescription: Prussians deploy farther forward. Larger Russian units for play balance. Game is one turn shorter

Jagersdorf.name: The Battle of Gross Jagersdorf
Jagersdorf.description: August 30, 1757. Prussian vs Russian. The Seven Years War.

extraArt.description: Extra Artillery, Prussians has setup mode

Montmirail1814.name: The Battle of Montmirail 1814
Montmirail1814.description: The Battle of Montmirail 1814 between the French and Prussian-Russian allies.

main.longDescription: Original

russianForward.longDescription: On the morning of the battle, the Russians ate oatmeal, and not the instant kind, the kind you cook for 45 minutes. This scenario assumes the russian had pop tarts, cold. So they got to the battle quicker.

frenchBack.longDescription: The french had eaten bad food the previous night and they all had to spend extra time in the out house. So they got to the battle later.

Hanau1813.name: The Battle of Hanau 1813
Hanau1813.description: The Battle of Hanau 1813 between the French and Austro-Bavarian-Russian allies.

main.longDescription: French Usually win as they did historically.

balance.longDescription: Allies may move on second turn, french may deploy one hex closer.

Golymin1806.name: The Battle of Golymin 1806
Golymin1806.description: The Battle of Golymin 1806 between the French and Russian.

main.longDescription: Mud Rule in effect. Clear/Trail 2 mp's.

options.name: Fog of war during Deployment. Enemy units remain hidden until movement phase..

main.longDescription: The Battle of Gadebusch 1712 Swedish vs Danish

lessSwedes.longDescription: The Swedish player has 6 infantry instead of 8. No Danish indecision either.

moreDanes.longDescription: The Danish player has 10 4-3's instead of 8. No Danish indecision either.

options.name: Fog of war during Deployment. Enemy units remain hidden until movement phase..

main.longDescription: Fords do not affect Combat.

options.name: Fog of war during Deployment. Enemy units remain hidden until movement phase..

options.name: Swedish 8-5 cavalry have step reduction and can be reduced to half strength in an exchange.
Fog of war during Deployment. Enemy units remain hidden until movement phase..
Stronger Danish Force, upgrade 4-5 to 6-4 and 4-3 to 6-3.
Hasty raised Swedish Army, half the 6-3's are 5-3.

main.longDescription: Swedish units move +1 first turn. Danish units move half first turn.

noSurprise.longDescription: No +1 movement for Swedish units, Danish units move full amount first turn.
